mapper.sql: AMHS_ID, DRIVER_SERVICE_ID, AMHS_NAME, AMHS_MODEL, AMHS_TYPE, DISPLAY_FLAG, TIME_SYNC_FLAG, NIC_ADDRESS, CONNECT_ADDRESS, CONNECT_PORT, HSMS_DEVICE_ID, HSMS_T3, HSMS_T5, HSMS_T6, HSMS_T7, HSMS_T8, HSMS_MODE, LINKTEST_TIMER, AMHS_GRP_ID, DEFAULT_TRANS_GRP_ID, DUMMY_FLAG, MICRO_CMD_LIMIT, FUNC_OPT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from AMHS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into AMHS (AMHS_ID, DRIVER_SERVICE_ID, AMHS_NAME, AMHS_MODEL, AMHS_TYPE, DISPLAY_FLAG, TIME_SYNC_FLAG, NIC_ADDRESS, CONNECT_ADDRESS, CONNECT_PORT, HSMS_DEVICE_ID, HSMS_T3, HSMS_T5, HSMS_T6, HSMS_T7, HSMS_T8, HSMS_MODE, LINKTEST_TIMER, AMHS_GRP_ID, DEFAULT_TRANS_GRP_ID, DUMMY_FLAG, MICRO_CMD_LIMIT, FUNC_OPT) values (#{amhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverServiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amhsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amhsModel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amhsType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{displayFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{timeSyncFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nicAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connectAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connectPort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hsmsDeviceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hsmsT3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hsmsT5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hsmsT6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hsmsT7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hsmsT8,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hsmsMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{linktestTimer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amhsGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultTransGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dummyFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{microCmdLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{funcOpt,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

AMHS_ID,

mapper.update:
update AMHS
AMHS_ID = #{record.amhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRIVER_SERVICE_ID = #{record.driverServiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMHS_NAME = #{record.amhsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMHS_MODEL = #{record.amhsModel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMHS_TYPE = #{record.amhsType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DISPLAY_FLAG = #{record.displayFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TIME_SYNC_FLAG = #{record.timeSyncFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NIC_ADDRESS = #{record.nicAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONNECT_ADDRESS = #{record.connectAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONNECT_PORT = #{record.connectPort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HSMS_DEVICE_ID = #{record.hsmsDeviceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HSMS_T3 = #{record.hsmsT3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HSMS_T5 = #{record.hsmsT5,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HSMS_T6 = #{record.hsmsT6,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HSMS_T7 = #{record.hsmsT7,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HSMS_T8 = #{record.hsmsT8,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HSMS_MODE = #{record.hsmsMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LINKTEST_TIMER = #{record.linktestTimer,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMHS_GRP_ID = #{record.amhsGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFAULT_TRANS_GRP_ID = #{record.defaultTransGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUMMY_FLAG = #{record.dummyFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MICRO_CMD_LIMIT = #{record.microCmdLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FUNC_OPT = #{record.funcOpt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update AMHS set AMHS_ID = #{record.amhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRIVER_SERVICE_ID = #{record.driverServiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMHS_NAME = #{record.amhsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMHS_MODEL = #{record.amhsModel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMHS_TYPE = #{record.amhsType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DISPLAY_FLAG = #{record.displayFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TIME_SYNC_FLAG = #{record.timeSyncFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NIC_ADDRESS = #{record.nicAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONNECT_ADDRESS = #{record.connectAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONNECT_PORT = #{record.connectPort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HSMS_DEVICE_ID = #{record.hsmsDeviceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HSMS_T3 = #{record.hsmsT3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HSMS_T5 = #{record.hsmsT5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HSMS_T6 = #{record.hsmsT6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HSMS_T7 = #{record.hsmsT7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HSMS_T8 = #{record.hsmsT8,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HSMS_MODE = #{record.hsmsMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LINKTEST_TIMER = #{record.linktestTimer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMHS_GRP_ID = #{record.amhsGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFAULT_TRANS_GRP_ID = #{record.defaultTransGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUMMY_FLAG = #{record.dummyFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MICRO_CMD_LIMIT = #{record.microCmdLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FUNC_OPT = #{record.funcOpt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update AMHS
DRIVER_SERVICE_ID = #{driverServiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMHS_NAME = #{amhsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMHS_MODEL = #{amhsModel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMHS_TYPE = #{amhsType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DISPLAY_FLAG = #{displayFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TIME_SYNC_FLAG = #{timeSyncFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NIC_ADDRESS = #{nicAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONNECT_ADDRESS = #{connectAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONNECT_PORT = #{connectPort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HSMS_DEVICE_ID = #{hsmsDeviceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HSMS_T3 = #{hsmsT3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HSMS_T5 = #{hsmsT5,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HSMS_T6 = #{hsmsT6,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HSMS_T7 = #{hsmsT7,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HSMS_T8 = #{hsmsT8,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HSMS_MODE = #{hsmsMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LINKTEST_TIMER = #{linktestTimer,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMHS_GRP_ID = #{amhsGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFAULT_TRANS_GRP_ID = #{defaultTransGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUMMY_FLAG = #{dummyFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MICRO_CMD_LIMIT = #{microCmdLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FUNC_OPT = #{funcOpt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where AMHS_ID = #{amhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update AMHS set DRIVER_SERVICE_ID = #{driverServiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMHS_NAME = #{amhsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMHS_MODEL = #{amhsModel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMHS_TYPE = #{amhsType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DISPLAY_FLAG = #{displayFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TIME_SYNC_FLAG = #{timeSyncFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NIC_ADDRESS = #{nicAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONNECT_ADDRESS = #{connectAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONNECT_PORT = #{connectPort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HSMS_DEVICE_ID = #{hsmsDeviceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HSMS_T3 = #{hsmsT3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HSMS_T5 = #{hsmsT5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HSMS_T6 = #{hsmsT6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HSMS_T7 = #{hsmsT7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HSMS_T8 = #{hsmsT8,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HSMS_MODE = #{hsmsMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LINKTEST_TIMER = #{linktestTimer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMHS_GRP_ID = #{amhsGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFAULT_TRANS_GRP_ID = #{defaultTransGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUMMY_FLAG = #{dummyFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MICRO_CMD_LIMIT = #{microCmdLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FUNC_OPT = #{funcOpt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where AMHS_ID = #{amhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: AMHS_ID, DRIVER_SERVICE_ID, AMHS_NAME, AMHS_MODEL, AMHS_TYPE, DISPLAY_FLAG, TIME_SYNC_FLAG, NIC_ADDRESS, CONNECT_ADDRESS, CONNECT_PORT, HSMS_DEVICE_ID, HSMS_T3, HSMS_T5, HSMS_T6, HSMS_T7, HSMS_T8, HSMS_MODE, LINKTEST_TIMER, AMHS_GRP_ID, DEFAULT_TRANS_GRP_ID, DUMMY_FLAG, TOTAL_SHELVES,MICRO_CMD_LIMIT,AVAILABLE,SYSTEM_STATE,ALARM_STATE, COMM_STATE,CONTROL_STATE,AMHS_L_STATE,AMHS_L_STATE_SET_TIME,AMHS_L_STATE_SET_AUTHOR, SHAPE_ID,FUNC_OPT
mapper.select:
select
from ( select row_number() over(order by AMHS.AMHS_ID ASC) rn, AMHS.AMHS_ID, DRIVER_SERVICE_ID, AMHS_NAME, (select STRING from STRING_MASTER where KEY = 'AMHS_MODEL_STRING' and CODE = AMHS.AMHS_MODEL) as AMHS_MODEL, (select STRING from STRING_MASTER where KEY = 'AMHS_TYPE_STRING' and CODE = AMHS.AMHS_TYPE) as AMHS_TYPE, DISPLAY_FLAG, TIME_SYNC_FLAG, NIC_ADDRESS, CONNECT_ADDRESS, CONNECT_PORT, HSMS_DEVICE_ID, HSMS_T3, HSMS_T5, HSMS_T6, HSMS_T7, HSMS_T8, (select STRING from STRING_MASTER where KEY = 'HSMS_MODE_STRING' and CODE = AMHS.HSMS_MODE) as HSMS_MODE, LINKTEST_TIMER, AMHS_GRP_ID, DEFAULT_TRANS_GRP_ID, DUMMY_FLAG, (case when (AMHS_TYPE = 1 or AMHS_TYPE = 21 or AMHS_TYPE = 25 or AMHS_TYPE = 31) then (select to_char(TOTAL_SHELVES) from STOCKER where AMHS.AMHS_ID = STOCKER.AMHS_ID) else null end) as TOTAL_SHELVES, MICRO_CMD_LIMIT, (select STRING from STRING_MASTER where KEY = 'AVAIL_STRING' and CODE = AMHS_STATE.AVAILABLE) as AVAILABLE, (select STRING from STRING_MASTER where KEY = 'AMHS_SYSTEM_STRING' and CODE = AMHS_STATE.SYSTEM_STATE) as SYSTEM_STATE, (select STRING from STRING_MASTER where KEY = 'ALARM_STRING' and CODE = AMHS_STATE.ALARM_STATE) as ALARM_STATE, (select STRING from STRING_MASTER where KEY = 'COMMUNICATION_STATE_STRING' and CODE = AMHS_STATE.COMM_STATE) as COMM_STATE, (select STRING from STRING_MASTER where KEY = 'CTRL_STATE_STRING' and CODE = AMHS_STATE.CONTROL_STATE) as CONTROL_STATE, (select STRING from STRING_MASTER where KEY = 'AMHS_LOGICAL_STATE_STRING' and CODE = AMHS_L_STATE) as AMHS_L_STATE, AMHS_L_STATE_SET_TIME, AMHS_L_STATE_SET_AUTHOR, (case when (AMHS_TYPE = 1 or AMHS_TYPE = 21 or AMHS_TYPE = 25 or AMHS_TYPE = 31) then (select STRING from STRING_MASTER, STOCKER where AMHS.AMHS_ID = STOCKER.AMHS_ID AND KEY = 'CARRIER_SHAPE_STRING' and CODE = STOCKER.SHAPE_ID) else null end) as SHAPE_ID, FUNC_OPT from AMHS left join AMHS_STATE on AMHS.AMHS_ID = AMHS_STATE.AMHS_ID
order by AMHS_ID asc )

select count(*) from ( select row_number() over(order by AMHS_ID ASC) rn, AMHS_ID, DRIVER_SERVICE_ID, AMHS_NAME, AMHS_MODEL, AMHS_TYPE, DISPLAY_FLAG, TIME_SYNC_FLAG, NIC_ADDRESS, CONNECT_ADDRESS, CONNECT_PORT, HSMS_DEVICE_ID, HSMS_T3, HSMS_T5, HSMS_T6, HSMS_T7, HSMS_T8, HSMS_MODE, LINKTEST_TIMER, AMHS_GRP_ID, DEFAULT_TRANS_GRP_ID, DUMMY_FLAG, MICRO_CMD_LIMIT from AMHS where AMHS_Id != #{amhsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by AMHS_ID asc ) where CONNECT_PORT = #{connectPort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select
from ( select row_number() over(order by AMHS_ID ASC) rn, AMHS_ID, DRIVER_SERVICE_ID, AMHS_NAME, (select STRING from STRING_MASTER where KEY = 'AMHS_MODEL_STRING' and CODE = AMHS.AMHS_MODEL) as AMHS_MODEL, (select STRING from STRING_MASTER where KEY = 'ALT_DEVICE_TYPE_STRING' and CODE = AMHS.AMHS_TYPE) as AMHS_TYPE, DISPLAY_FLAG, TIME_SYNC_FLAG, NIC_ADDRESS, CONNECT_ADDRESS, CONNECT_PORT, HSMS_DEVICE_ID, HSMS_T3, HSMS_T5, HSMS_T6, HSMS_T7, HSMS_T8, (select STRING from STRING_MASTER where KEY = 'HSMS_MODE_STRING' and CODE = AMHS.HSMS_MODE) as HSMS_MODE, LINKTEST_TIMER, AMHS_GRP_ID, DEFAULT_TRANS_GRP_ID, DUMMY_FLAG, MICRO_CMD_LIMIT, FUNC_OPT from AMHS
order by AMHS_ID asc )

select
from AMHS where AMHS_TYPE in (1, 21, 25) order by AMHS_ID asc

select AMHS_ID from ( select AMHS_ID, COUNT(*) as NUM from ( select distinct AMHS_ID, CASE WHEN INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 1) = 0 THEN NULL WHEN INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 2) = 0 THEN SUBSTR(PHASE, INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 1) + 1) ELSE SUBSTR(PHASE, INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 1) + 1, INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 2) - INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 1) - 1) END FLOOR from PORT where AMHS_ID is not null ) group by AMHS_ID ) where NUM > 1 order by AMHS_ID asc

select distinct A.AMHS_ID as AMHS_ID from AMHS A left outer join ( select AMHS_ID, PORT_ID, CASE WHEN INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 1) = 0 THEN NULL WHEN INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 2) = 0 THEN SUBSTR(PHASE, INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 1) + 1) ELSE SUBSTR(PHASE, INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 1) + 1, INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 2) - INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 1) - 1) END FLOOR from PORT where PORT_TYPE = 11 ) F on A.AMHS_ID = F.AMHS_ID where A.AMHS_TYPE = 81 and F.FLOOR = #{floor} order by AMHS_ID asc

select distinct A.AMHS_ID as AMHS_ID from AMHS A left outer join ( select AMHS_ID, PORT_ID, CASE WHEN INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 1) = 0 THEN NULL WHEN INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 2) = 0 THEN SUBSTR(PHASE, INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 1) + 1) ELSE SUBSTR(PHASE, INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 1) + 1, INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 2) - INSTR(PHASE, '|', 1, 1) - 1) END FLOOR from PORT where PORT_TYPE = 2 ) F on A.AMHS_ID = F.AMHS_ID where A.AMHS_TYPE = 51 and F.FLOOR = #{floor} order by AMHS_ID asc
